snippet: A range of “Messiah” performances are available in New York, including those from the St. Thomas Choir of Men and Boys and the Trinity Choir.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performances of Handel's Messiah by St Thomas Choir of Men and Boys and Concert Royal at St Thomas Church and by Trinity Choir and Baroque Orchestra at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: A range of “Messiah” performances are available in New York, including those from the St. Thomas Choir of Men and Boys and the Trinity Choir.

headline.seo: ‘Messiah’ at St. Thomas and Alice Tully Hall
headline.main: From Seething to Earnest, a Work Raises Passions
headline.print_headline: From Seething to Earnest, a Work Raises Passions
